name: Delta Neo: Holodeck Alpha
description:
This is a short mechanical showcase of Gismo Game's next game, Delta Neo. 

What is the Holodeck Alpha?

In short, the Holodeck Alpha is a short showcase of Delta Neo’s primary mechanics and a small glimpse into the overall story of Delta Neo. The holodeck, in a much smaller form, does make an appearance in Delta Neo, however the holodeck showcased in the Holodeck Alpha has a few extra things added to it in order to better introduce the player to the lore and mechanics of Delta Neo.

Escape and Learn

Escape a corrupted game while learning and mastering the primary mechanics of Delta Neo.

Shooting Range

Test your shooting capabilities at the shooting range. Up your high score and compare it to your friends!

For more information about the Holodeck Alpha, visit its official website here.

Visit the official Gismo Games website here to learn more about Delta Neo and Gismo Games as a whole.
